mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dashboards (kee, user_id, name, description, column_layout, shared, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{key}, #{userId, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnLayout, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shared}, #{createdAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
